author: pcs
msg: Actually, without a DefaultLanguage documents are considered to have _no_
language attribute. Apache does not default to English.

author: pcs
msg: Actually, without a DefaultLanguage documents are considered to have _no_
language attribute. Apache does not default to English.

author: rse
msg: Allow special options -Wc,xxx and -Wl,xxx on APXS compile/link command.  They
can occur multiple times and their arguments (`xxx') are passed AS IS to the
compiler/linker command. This functionality was originally requested by Rasmus
for PHP but is useful for other packages, too.

author: rse
msg: Some cleanups and documentation updates after Randy's recent commits.
